class_notes:
(Same as HLTH 369 1)
(Permission Required Prior to Enrollment)
(Please contact Sally Radell for a permission number: sradell@emory.edu)
course_description: This course is designed for dancers, movers, and aspiring movement practitioners to develop a deeper anatomical understanding of the body and to explore anatomical relationships through movement, somatic practices, and neuromuscular exercises.
sections: Class Nbr: 1050, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 8:30-9:45a, Instructor: E. Faulkner, Status: Open
